name: Doggy!
description:
Summary

Doggy! is a platformer game which you will play as a cute dog and meet
some different functions platforms and different directions portals. You should make
the right reactions to pass a game level.

Gameplay

The gameplay is all about jump, crouch or dash. In the game, you need to
move the doggy and use jump, crouch or dash to overcome the obstructs.

Mindset
The main mindset of the game is that I want to the player feel adventurous
and nervous. This is a little hard game which you need to calculate the right time to
input the command. In the whole game, the safe time is very concise, so that the
player needs to try again and again until pass the obstructs.
